newsitem.title: FRANCE: French team to help destroy Bosnian Serb arms.
newsitem.headline: French team to help destroy Bosnian Serb arms.

text.p: Bosnian Serb leaders have authorised a French team of experts to destroy several of their heavy weapons, the French Foreign Ministry said on Monday.

A ministry spokesman told reporters that a team of specialists was due to arrive in Bosnia-Herzegovina on Monday to help destroy weapons as agreed in accords signed on June 14. He gave no further details.

"We are aware of the difficulties which destroying equipment raises for certain parties. So we have offered help in reducing arms through the Organisation for Security and Co-operation in Europe," the spokesman said.
Only the Bosnian Serb republic has so far accepted help from France.
